oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Provost Marshal pass
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Provost Marshal pass for Samuel Bogart signed by Lt. Thomas Underwood, 2nd Ohio Hvy. Arty. Btry., USA. Bogart had served in Co. G, 37th Tenn. Inf. Regt., CSA but had taken the oath of allegiance to the Union in September 1863 in Athens, Tennessee. The 2nd Ohio Heavy Artillery Battery was on occupation duty in East Tennessee throughout the spring of 1865.
